import { Dialog, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { useState,useEffect, useRef } from 'react' export default function NewAthleteForm({ newFighter, setNewFighter,onAddFighter }) { const [gyms, setGyms] = useState([]) const [divisions, setDivisions] = useState([]) const formRef = useRef(null); // GET GYMS to map in form useEffect(() => { const fetchGyms = async () => { let res = await fetch("http:localhost:3000/gyms?order=name"); let gymData = await res.json(); setGyms(gymData); }; fetchGyms(); },[]); // GET DIVISIONS to map in form - !!! Route not working !!! useEffect(() => { const fetchDivisions = async () => { let res = await fetch("http:localhost:3000/divisions"); let divisionData = await res.json(); setDivisions(divisionData); }; fetchDivisions(); },[]); // POST new fighter function handleSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault(); const formData = new FormData(formRef.current); const addNewFighter = async () => { try { let res = await fetch('http:localhost:3000/fighters', { method: 'POST', body: formData }) let newFighterData = await res.json(); setNewFighter(newFighterData); // Log the server's response to the console } catch (error) { console.error(error); // Log any errors to the console // Do something to handle the error, such as displaying an error message to the user } } } return ( <>
